org.elasticsearch.http.netty.cors

Class CorsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.netty.channel.SimpleChannelUpstreamHandler
      • org.elasticsearch.http.netty.cors.CorsHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jboss.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, org.jboss.netty.channel.ChannelUpstreamHandler

    public class CorsHandler
extends org.jboss.netty.channel.SimpleChannelUpstreamHandler
    Handles Cross Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) requests.

    This handler can be configured using a CorsConfig, please refer to this class for details about the configuration options available. This code was borrowed from Netty 4 and refactored to work for Elasticsearch's Netty 3 setup.
